version_description:
- Added support for iOS 8, iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
- Added a notification on switching between 12/24-hour clock
- Fixed font design and kerning
- Fixed minor bugs

- Support portrait orientation
- Support iPad Pro
- Adjusted details of behaviors
- Fixed minor bugs
- Fixed font design and kerning

- Support iPhone X/XS/XR/XS Max
- Added settings screen
- Added show/hide options of background tiles
- Support 24-hour with/without leading zeros
- Added brightness control inside the app
- Support haptic feedback

- Support iPad Pro (2018 model, 3rd generation)
- Fixed minor bugs

- Improved settings screen
- Fixed minor bugs

version_description: - Fixed compatibility with some iPads on iOS 10.x

- Fixed compatibility with iOS 13 and iPadOS 13
- Fixed minor bugs
- Adjusted details of behaviors
- Fixed a bug that operation delay occurs after the app returns to the foreground in version 2.0.5
